description: Enterprise techniques used by CCBkdr, ATT&CK software S0222 v1.1
name: CCBkdr (S0222)

techniques.comment: CCBkdr can use a DGA for Fallback Channels if communications with the primary command and control server are lost.[1]
CCBkdr was added to a legitimate, signed version 5.33 of the CCleaner software and distributed on CCleaner's distribution site.[1][2][3]
